result.eng: They were standing in the middle of the street, handing out leaflets.
result.ga: Bhí siad ina seasamh i lár na sráide ag scaipeadh bileog
result.orig: Bhí siad ina seasamh i lár na sráide ag scaipeadh bileog
result.html: Bhí siad ina seasamh i lár na sráide ag scaipeadh bileogThey were standing in the middle of the street, handing out leaflets.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ina seasaṁ i lár na sráide ag scaipeaḋ bileogThey were standing in the middle of the street, handing out leaflets.

result.eng: He was standing at the bar.
result.ga: Bhí sé ina sheasamh ag an bheár
result.orig: Bhí sé ina sheasamh ag an bheár
result.html: Bhí sé ina sheasamh ag an bheárHe was standing at the bar.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ina ẛeasaṁ ag an ḃeárHe was standing at the bar.

result.eng: I was standing behind the counter all day.
result.ga: Bhí mé i mo sheasamh taobh thiar den chuntar ar feadh an lae
result.orig: Bhí mé i mo sheasamh taobh thiar den chuntar ar feadh an lae
result.html: Bhí mé i mo sheasamh taobh thiar den chuntar ar feadh an laeI was standing behind the counter all day.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé i mo ẛeasaṁ taoḃ ṫiar den ċuntar ar feaḋ an laeI was standing behind the counter all day.

result.ga: Tá sé ag dul san iomaíocht i dtoghchán
result.orig: Tá sé ag dul san iomaíocht i dtoghchán
result.html: Tá sé ag dul san iomaíocht i dtoghchánHe is standing for election.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag dul san iomaíoċt i dtoġċánHe is standing for election.

result.eng: You should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ga: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.orig: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile

result.ponchtml: Ba ċóir duit ḃeiṫ ag caint le do ṁacasaṁail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.
